data.title: Pierre Aumont
data.text:
Jean-Pierre Aumont

AKA Jean-Pierre Philippe Salomons

Born: 5-Jan-1911

Birthplace: Paris, France

Died: 30-Jan-2001

Location of death: Gassin, France

Cause of death: unspecified

Remains: Buried, Cimetière du Père Lachaise, Paris, France

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Actor

Nationality: France

Executive summary: La Machine Infernale

Military service: Free French Army (WWII)

Best known for his stage role in La Machine Infernale, Paris.

Father: Alexandre Salomons (department store owner)

Mother: Suzanne Cahen

Brother: François Villiers

Wife: Blanche Montel (div. 1940)

Wife: Maria Montez (actress, m. 13-Jul-1943, d. 7-Sep-1951, one daughter)

Daughter: Tina Aumont (actress, born "Maria Christina", b. 14-Feb-1946, d. 28-Oct-2006)

Wife: Marisa Pavan (actress, m. 1956, until his death, two sons)

Son: Jean-Claude

Son: Patrick

University: Paris Conservatory

French Legion of Honor

Croix de Guerre

Jewish Ancestry Paternal

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

The Proprietor (9-Oct-1996)

Hilda Crane (2-May-1956)

Charge of the Lancers (Feb-1954)

The Cross of Lorraine (12-Nov-1943)

Assignment in Brittany (11-Mar-1943) · Capt. Matard
